A fan-made visual novel based on Key/VisualArt's' Clannad, taking place years prior to the events of it. The story follows Okazaki Naoyuki, and on the canon route, culminates in the story of Okazaki's loss of Atsuko.

Contains multiple endings based on choices with a non-canon bonus romantic route included.

name: Clocknockers 2
summary: BAD DUDES HAVE FROZEN TIME ALL OVER THE WORLD. YOU HAVE TO RETURN TIME TO NORMAL AND SAVE THE PEOPLE OF EARTH.

name: Climbtime
summary: Climbtime - jump and parkour climb up procedurally generated levels for best self or leaderboard time to the top. Fly (Vive controllers only) and glide to destroy cores also for leaderboard times. Hunt down small crystals within the level in crystal hunt mode or explore the real-world based terrain.

name: Close Range
summary: Duke is now forced to deal with everything from simple Troopers to fat Commanders using nothing but his mighty boot and tripmines.

name: Clutch Hitter
summary: A baseball game featuring the 1991 rosters of Major League Baseball, including the All-Star teams.

name: Clyde's Adventure
summary: A DOS puzzle-platformer from Moonlite Software.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Complete Edition
summary: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Complete Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks.

name: Click on piña coladas together
summary: Can you and your friends find all 100+ piña coladas in this panoramic level?

name: Close Me
summary: You start the game, you wake up, and eventually you will close the game. One day, you may even start the game again. That's the game.

name: Clash of Lords 2
summary: Clash of Lords 2 is a strategy game with fun and innovative twists on the genre. Recruit over 50 Heroes and their mercenaries, build and defend a base, and fight alongside your friends in over 10 PvE and PvP modes! Get ready to Clash!

name: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind
summary: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind is a two-player, Space Invaders-esque game for the Commodore 64.

name: Classified Stories: The Tome of Myrkah
summary:
Classified Stories: The Tome of Myrkah is a first-person, micro-adventure game that focuses entirely on exploration and discovery, with elements of occult and extraordinary.
Investigate and piece together the events that transpired at this seemingly normal farm.

name: Cluckzilla
summary: The most dramatic chicken game ever seen

name: Climb Challenge
summary: Climb Challenge is a third person perspective game were the player must navigate through three challenging levels. Each level has a unique design and play style challenging the players observation skills, puzzle solving skills, speed and most of all their determination to complete the game.

name: Climbing with Silly Cat
summary: Fun and difficult game about climbing with cute silly cat that rotate a lot! With 10 unlockable skins Game includes cute cat pictures! And you can meow!!!

name: Classic Trivia
summary: Classic Trivia is a trivia game for trivia lovers with original questions in classic categories: geography, history, literature, and science. The game has no user submitted questions or multiple choice answers, instead opting for hangman style slots with 20 letters to spell it out.

name: Clay Game
summary: Explore a world handcrafted from clay. Make dumb jokes with your Foxcat friend. Use magic to solve puzzles. Can you solve the mystery at the Wizard Tower?

name: Clan Senki
summary:
A casual 8bit fantasy MMORPG for mobile devices and web browsers planned for a Japanese release in 2018.
It has been in development for 3 years.

name: Classic Logical Bundle
summary: Classic Logical Bundle is a bundle of Beat the Four, The Mines, Reversi Rulez, and Tic'o'Toe. This bundle is sure to bring you back to the yesteryear of gaming. So put your feet up and get ready to experience the classics of gaming, alone or with a friend!

name: Clean Corps
summary: Clean Corps is a first person shooter that sees you take the role of a trash collecting superhero created by a child to inspire others to help clean his local beach! Use your vacuum arm to shoot enemies and suck up garbage to clear each level as fast as you can and take out the trash!

name: Cleansuit
summary: Cleansuit is a retro-style graphical text adventure game where you must find creative ways to survive a mysterious serial killer's assault on your home. Use text commands to manipulate the detailed environment and discover all the unique ways to win and die.

name: Clockwork Manor
summary:
Venture into the clockwork manor, a mysterious place that seems to know your deepest desires. Do daily tasks as the manor's new maid, while the manor impedes you at every step!
This is an 18+ game made for the Strawberry Jam 7 game jam. In particular, it has elements of hypnosis, reality shifting, and transformation.

name: CloudCity VR
summary: Build your magnificent metropolis from scratch in VR. Keep your citizens happy and grow your economy to watch your city prosper around you. Experience your city in a full day/night cycle in rain or shine from both giant and first-person perspectives.

name: Clockwork Kingdom
summary: 1-bit dungeon crawler

name: Closed Circuit
summary: A port of Closed Circuit for Playdate

name: Clickart
summary: Click Art is a clicker with a side view, where the player clicks monsters, buys improvements, pumping up monster destruction as well as click damage levels, progressing through new levels and discovering new worlds and types of monsters.

name: Clue/Cluedo: Black Adder Resort Bundle
summary: Step into new Crime Scenes. Use your skills of deduction to unravel the mystery and find out who did it, with what weapon, where. It's the original crime-solving classic with new investigation formats exclusive to the video game. Solve every case and become the detective you want to be!

name: Clicky Coven
summary: Clicky Coven is an incremental game about building a witch coven. Assign witches to gather ingredients, brew potions, and sell them to earn gold.

name: Click to 13
summary: CLICK THE BUTTON. click the button. cLiCk ThE bUtToN. The unofficial sequel, of the unofficial sequel, of click to ten. Explore the intriguing story of how you go from 0 to 1. 1 to 2. 2 to 3. and you know the rest.

name: Clock Ticker
summary: Control the flow of time in this mysterious idle game. Buy upgrades to make the clock turn faster.

name: Clear The Coast
summary:
A rather large, mostly outdoor map, designed for classic duke and taking full
advantage of the new build limits.
So expect some big outdoor locations and the freedom to roam and stroll around a lot.

name: Clatter
summary: Create and command your own customizable squads of fighting robots in this turn-based, arena tactics game.

name: Click Manga: Click no Hi
summary: An interactive comic with designs by Izumi Takemoto.

name: Climb and Fall Dice Adventure
summary: Get ready for a thrilling new take on the classic "Snake and Ladder" game with "Climb and Fall: A Dice Adventure"! With intuitive controls and easy-to-learn rules, this exciting game is perfect for players of all ages and skill levels. Roll the dice and climb your way to the top, but be careful of the pitfalls and obstacles that lie in your path. Will you be able to outwit your opponents and emerge victorious?

name: Clawstar Wrestling
summary: Clawstar Wrestling follows the story of Elijah, a small-time wrestler with a big problem by the name of Tremor. His weekly routine of losing to the antagonistic heel is starting to put a strain on his life outside of the ring. Eli must navigate his complicated relationship with his profession, as well as dealing with a 500 pound thorn in his side.

name: Clippyworld: An Unexpected Journey
summary: Clippyworld: An Unexpected Journey is a very unexpected Journey of my first 22 maps of the Clippy era. Many moons ago before this 10-15 years in the past I tried to make maps but ppl despised them. Clippyworld is my second life as a mapper and these maps seemed to actually be liked this time around. Enjoy a series of random, challenging maps that explore all sorts of random gimmicks and yes, SECRETS GALORE! One map has 100 secrets!

name: Clover Cuby
summary:
Tap to move and double tap to jump.
Catch Rainbow Clover to become Invincible to defeat Bad Caterpillar.
Compete and share with your friends!

name: Clannad Key Trilogy Premium Box
summary: A collection of visual novels developed by Key for the Playstation 2.

name: Clans to Kingdoms
summary:
Clans to Kingdoms is a 4X Turn-Base Strategy City Building Video Game for Windows PC. You start as a small Clan with one single settlement and the aim is to manage and develop your civilization up to a Kingdom with several cities and armies. 
 
The game has 6 settlement levels, 3 outpost levels, 120 researches, 150 distinct buildings and 21 distinct military units. Both single and multiplayer games can be played with up to 15 civilizations.

name: Clapper - A rhythm and clap game!
summary: Clapper is a two-player rhythm game.

name: Closing Spaces
summary:
Ai and Ren -not so voluntarily dubbed the 'love-love' twins have been inseparable since birth. Together all the time, encased in their little bubble. No one entered, no one left, and nothing else mattered.
Then along comes Takuma, a persistent high school senior who was for some reason repeating the year.

Play as Taku, the happy-go-lucky charmer with a low-key violent side as he worms his way into Ren's closed-off heart.

name: clock out.
summary: Take on the role of a nervous data analyst trying to calm himself down before a job interview at a mysterious company...

name: Cloudbase Prime
summary: Your shift on a gas giant mining platform does not go as planned. Move terrain to clear paths, defeat enemies, and launch yourself skyward. Shoot robots while jumping. A decent Monday.

name: Clonk Planet
summary: Clonk Planet is a strategy game released on the PC in Germany in 2000, and made freeware in 2004.

name: Closed Hands
summary: The game plays out through a combination of traditional interactive text, as well as explorable computer interfaces, conversations, IM's, phonecalls and more. CLOSED HANDS is a fragmented and complex narrative, playable in any order, that tells the story of the lead-up and aftermath of the attack: some stories go forward in time, some backwards, and some both. Players can choose to follow a single narrative arc, or jump between perspectives to get the full picture of everything that happens to the city, and it's inhabitants.

name: Classic Games Puzzle Collection
summary: Indulge in nostalgia with the Classic Games Puzzle Collection, featuring a selection of beloved video game classics that are sure to evoke fond memories.

name: Clucking Dubbed to Feathers
summary: Clucking Dubbed to Feath(ers) is a tiny Heretic speedmap I made after realizing that when a player gets shot by a morph ovum (egg) while already a chicken, they will become a super chicken, circumventing the need to kill a player as a chicken to do so.

name: Click To Ten 3D
summary: the number rises, in 3D

name: CloudStudy
summary: An online study room shared by players around the world. Those who work hard for their dreams are welcome to join.

name: Close Combat
summary:
Close Combat is a World War II real-time tactics game, developed by Atomic Games, and released on January 1, 1996 for the Mac and June 30, 1996 for the PC. The first installment of the Close Combat series, the game is played on a two-dimensional map, between two players.

Close Combat is based on the fighting of the U.S. 29th Infantry Division and the German defenders from Omaha Beach to Saint-Lô during Operation Cobra; all the units in the game are based on those used in 1944. The game may be played as either the Germans, or the Americans.The game received mainly positive reviews.

name: Cloud Mage
summary: You're a cloud mage doing weather spells for clients. Choose the right ingredients to make the right spells!

name: Classified: of 2015
summary:
In [CLASSIFIED] of 2015, play as a yearbook editor working at a photography studio, trying to make sense of a bizarre photoshoot at Voyager Academy.

Use context clues and sleuth through the available photos to determine who's who, and solve the mystery of what went down at this middle school.

name: Clever Kids: Creepy Crawlies
summary: "Hi, I'm Sprocket.... Join me on a journey to meet some of the slimiest, squirmiest, wriggliest creatures on earth. From the tiniest insects to huge bettles, giant centipedes and deadly spiders, you'll learn everything you need to become a master of creepy-crawly knowledge!" - Play a host of Fun games: help a dung beetle, defend a garden against centipedes and spiders, solve jigsaws, beat the Quiz and much more! - Clever Kids games make learning and development Fun For all ages.

name: Classic Game
summary:
The game is about the hermit returning to a land now ravaged by curses. It uses a custom combat system, and there are many hidden events to experience.

Lose Reasons-to-live, become cursed, meet a girl, consume human souls, die in more than a few ways; experiment to find secrets, strange interactions & rebukes.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Complete Edition +
Claw Clash: Cat vs. Dog Betting
summary: This is a novel VR casual game that allows players to enjoy endless fun in the battle between cats and dogs.

name: Click on their Heads
summary: Do you like a cheap chuckle? The objective of the game is fairly straight forward - trolls will spawn in increasing numbers and rush towards you. Your job is to click on their heads. If you do that, you progress. If you don't, you lose the game when they touch you.

name: Clerk Hot Tale
summary: Clerk Hot Tale is a visual novel in which the player goes through all the circles of bureaucratic hell, accompanied by an adorable female official.

name: Climax Landers: Motte ke! Minige Campaign
summary: Retail disc used in a Japan-wide store campaign before Climax Landers/Time Stalkers for Dreamcast was released. It allowed you to download 3 different free Climax Landers related mini games to your VMU, if you brought it to a participating location. Copies of the disc have since been sold online unofficially.

name: Climbros
summary: Climbros is an addictive two-dimensional arcade game in which you will be able to climb. You can play in single player mode or with a group of friends in local cooperation mode. Surprise, amusement, helplessness, joy, satisfaction - expect a whole range of emotions.

name: Click On Candy Together
summary: Can you and your friends find all 100+ candies in this panoramic level?

name: Clean Cut
summary: Medium-sized idbase industrial facility with tight corridors, glass windows and pipes.

name: Clash of the Elements
summary: Wield the elements to compose the music in real time by battling your friends! Choose among the proposed maps, unite and combine the elements to create your unique mix, reflecting the process of fierce battle in abstract 2D space.

name: Clandestinity of Elsie
summary: World War Two veteran and mentally-damaged alcoholic Hayden Warrick awakens from a night of drinking to find that his wife Elsie has mysteriously disappeared.

name: Cloud Piercer
summary: It's time to go on an adventure! Board an airship, load your cannons, set off to discover the secrets of the clouds and... Who knows? How far can you go?

name: Clowned Pro
summary:
Pro version of the game 'Clowned'. Similar to the first one, you have to collect 8 papers to win the game, but this time you must avoid the 8 fake papers which are scattered around the map. Every time you collect a fake paper, the clown rushes at you.

Each time you collect a paper, the monster respawns back to the original position but gets a little angrier. The more papers you collect, the angrier he becomes. The key to complete the game is speed - collect the papers as fast as you can and avoid the monster.

TIP: There is a faint path on the floor. Follow this to find the papers.

name: Clean Adventure
summary: Clean Adventure is an educational adventure game. Use your soap gun to defend yourself from germs. Be careful - there are many germs at the streets! Keep yourself safe with the collectable items.

name: Clinically Dead
summary:
You are dying.
Oxygen level in your brain drastically drops down.
You are seeing all your life, flashing before your eyes.
You are no longer on earth. You are unconscious.
For everyone else this is the matter of seconds, but for you this is taking forever.

name: Clash of the Metal
summary: Hyper Mecha Anime Manga Fighting Unleashed! Clash of the Metal introduces the mecha combat league in a glorious 2D anime styled arcade action fighting game..

name: Class of '09: The Flip Side
summary: The final chapter of the Class of '09 VN series... this time from a different perspective! Join Nicole's best friend Jecka as you help her navigate the pitfalls of post-grad life! See what 2009 was truly like in this fully voiced interactive sitcom!

name: Classic Compendium
summary: A puzzle game which contains a collection of five board games: chess, checkers, backgammon, Reversi, and Four in a Line.

name: Clockwind
summary: Platform and Travel through time!

name: Cleopatra: Riddle of the Tomb
summary: Cleopatra: Riddle of the Tomb is a PC adventure game set it ancient Egypt.

name: Cluck Cluck'em
summary: Grow your humble farm into an empire!

name: Clumsy Chef
summary: Clumsy Chef is a simple 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to play for the cook who just loves donuts.

name: Claustrophobia
summary: Claustrophobia offers a scary and dark horror experience filled with blood boiling moments, The game can have different endings, depending on how you play and what decisions you make. Can you figure out what the government is hiding in this grueling facility?

name: Climax Tennis: WTA Tour Edition
summary: Konami's WTA follow-up

name: Classic Internet Scary Maze Game: Game Boy Edition
summary: An unofficial Game Boy demake of The Maze.

name: Click For Cash: Cashed Out
summary:
it's time to click till you're filthy rich... again!

Welcome to Click For Cash: Cashed Out, the best idle clicker game about yellow buttons since the original Click For Cash! This sequel is filled to the brim with new features, customization, and polish. In this game you click a button for cash (real original, I know), purchase a variety of upgrades to get more money, and unlock achievements to become the richest person in the universe! at least in the game...

name: C.L.A.Y.: The Last Redemption
summary: C.L.A.Y.: The Last Redemption is a story-driven role playing game set in a post-post-apocalyptic city. You are the Scion of your tribe, and soon you will be chieftain. Prove yourself to the Elders; lead your crew; build your character and uncover the secret stories of the living city you call home.

name: Clickbox
summary:
A tamagotchi-like growing game. Take care of your little box while you're doing something else. Water plants, feed animals and hatch eggs.

A remake of the 2014 original.

name: Cluck Avengers
summary: After years of oppression, one courageous chicken decides to turn on the fast food industry that keeps turning him and his peers into delicious fried food.

name: Clone 2048
summary:
In the year 2048, the entire planet of Wuberan has been contaminated by a mysterious virus. Will you be able to survive this dangerous feat in the game Clone 2048? Dr. Wong has the opportunity and the privilege of being assigned the power to investigate this strange event.

Enjoy this perfect fusion between a Tower Defense game and a Match 3 game and get ready to live a unique pitched battle surrounded by soldiers as you combine identical ones to evolve them to improve your defenses as much as possible and annihilate once and for all all the approaching zombies ready to destroy everything. Do not let humanity come to an end and discover the solution to this terrible evil that threatens the safety of the world. Good luck...

name: Clive Barker's Jericho: Special Edition
summary: Sometimes referred to as simply Jericho, is a first person shooter survival horror video game with author Clive Barker providing the premise of the storyline. Jericho's core gameplay consists of leading the game's seven-man team codenamed Jericho, allowing control of all team members by jumping to each character during certain points in the game, through various environments that have been warped by the Firstborn while fighting off a variety of twisted creatures.

name: Clown's Secret
summary: A 2D point and click adventure game, based on classic movies of the silent age.

name: Clone Clicker
summary: Casually click clones, create catastrophic circumstances, circumvent causality, cause chaos. Cool!

name: Cleopatra no Mahou
summary: Daisuke Kusano is the son of an archaeologist who disappeared while searching for the Tears of Isis, artifacts once owned by Cleopatra. During the man's excavation for the Tears, demons appeared and abducted him. The boy soon learns that he must find the Tears in order to save his father.

name: ClickRaid
summary: A Competitive Multi-player clicker game.

name: Clash of Magic: Spectator Mode
summary:
On the United Island of Magic, there is an Academy of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Students with magic powers, regardless of their ethnicity and background, can apply to this university. The acceptance rate is lower than Harvard. Once in, they will have the access to learn from the masters of Magic and train with other equally outstanding and magical peers.
The life on the island was fun and rewarding, until one day, a new principal took power and want to purify the magic world and to prevent exterratial blood using the power of magic.
Students now feel the urgency of gaining more skills and training harder to win the principal eventually at the annual Clash of Magic tournament and the winner will replace the current principal and lead the Magic world to a more thriving and peaceful land.

name: Classic Pool and Cyber Pool Bundle
summary: This bundle offers a thrilling and immersive pool experience, allowing players to test their skills and enjoy the best of both worlds.

name: Clay Shoot
summary: The goal is the shoot clay targets which can appear in groups up to three targets at once.

name: Clarice Clairvoyage
summary: Clarice Clairvoyage is a traditional roguelike adventure where you'll need to navigate the open seas while exploring the islands which offer 'choose your own adventure' style quests.

name: Clash: Robot Detective - Complete Edition
summary: Crack the case with Clash!

name: Clash Force 2
summary: Introducing Clash Force 2! The evil General Crackman has returned, hacking Clash Force’s weapons systems and launching a full scale attack on their home turf! Once again, Voom the Rhinoceros, Scorpido the Scorpion, and Echid, the aptly named Echidna, must armor up, take back their base, and launch an assault on Crackman’s powered up forces!

name: Clicker Achievements: The Impossible Challenge
summary:
The almost impossible challenge to find all hidden achievements is waiting for you!
Click the button, cash out achievements and be ready for some small surprises!
It's time to proof yourself as the best achievement hunter of all times!

name: Cloud Castle
summary: 《Cloud Castle》It is a strategic tower defense game that builds your defense route by placing and upgrading on a grid map, resisting waves of monsters.

name: Cliffhanger: Challenger of Tomorrow
summary: Punch out Fascists and unravel conspiracies in this explosive pulp adventure set in a wild 1930s world of airships, fast cars and two-fisted action!

name: Clockwork
summary: Clockwork, set in the great mechanical city of Watchtower, is a story about unlikely friends coming together to try to fix an imperfect world. The city’s mysterious past is questioned when Atto’s trusty pocket watch suddenly wakes up and introduces itself as Milli. Renewed with a sense of purpose, Atto and Milli must explore the city, control time and confront terrifying bosses, before it’s too late.

name: ClayFighter 63 1/3
summary: Get ready to crumble! Once again, the clay fighters prove that when you play a state-of-the-art fighter, you might lose lives, you might lose limbs, but there's no reason to lose your sense of humor! Fight in and out of 3D backgrounds. Get tossed out of a window and resume fighting outside. Choose form 12 eccentric fighters including brand new combatants and old favorites like "Bad Mister Frosty" and "Bonker the Clown." Includes bonus "secret characters" who are so famous that a legal gag order prohibits us from revealing their identity. Move freely in over 12 highly detailed 3D environments.

name: Clearance Sale
summary: Clearance Sale is an experimental spinoff to the Make Me Real series about shopping in a store's last days.

name: Clash of Clones: kill birds like a ninja
summary:
Do you like bird clones? If not then join us to destroy as many as you can!
Survive and kill them all!

name: Click Manga: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu 2
summary: An interactive comic game based on the series in which the player can make advance the comic story clicking in it. The gameplay is that the player has to solve some puzzles or click with the pointer in a comic book scene to advance to the next scene. This game continues the story of the first game in the series.

name: Clusterball
summary: What is Clusterball? It's a sport. Clusterball is an online sport, designed to invoke the same adrenaline rush as Quake and Unreal, but replacing the spatter and gore with pure gameplay. By combining the feel and gaming experience from ball, flight and racing games, Clusterball is totally unlike anything you?ve ever seen before.

name: Click and Collect
summary: Serve your customers as efficiently as possible to maintain your reputation as the best darn store keeper around in this frantic, time and resource management, strategy, arcade action game.

name: Clown2Beat
summary: You are selected to be part of a circus, open the doors and beat the Clowns, solving the challenges before the clock ends.

name: ClassiCube
summary: An exceedingly simple sandbox building-block game.

name: Clue/Cluedo: Epic Crime Collection
summary: More tangled mysteries await in ten epic Crime Scenes. Find out what happens after Tudor Mansion, at the Black Adder resort. How did every suspect come to be in the same place at the same time? And who murdered Callan Coral?! The plot progresses in this official sequel.

name: Climber
summary: This is a little adventure in the depths of a mysterious cave. Try on the role of a rescuer and try to save the lives of a team of missing cavers as quickly as possible. You will need concentration, discipline and strong hands, because the owners of these depths do not like uninvited guests.

name: Click Cricket
summary: Click Cricket is a single player casual cricket simulation for PC. The simple but engaging gameplay makes each match is unique with its own set of challenges to overcome and ensure victory on the field!

name: Claws & Feathers
summary: Get ready for the fur to fly in this wild and crazy matching game! With dozens of challenging levels, bright and colorful graphics, and a storyline that will have you squawking with laughter, Claws and Feathers will provide hours matching fun!

name: Climax Heroines
summary: Climax Heroines is a dungeon crawler about women with huge breasts trying to save their childhood home.

name: Clarity in Qualia
summary: Alyx allowed his mother to dictate every aspect of his life, but can he learn to accept himself before it's too late?

name: Classic Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Classic Jigsaw Puzzles - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Classic Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Clumsy Runners
summary: Learn how to successfully run while making qua-zillion mistakes. Run through 10 procedurally generated chapters. Die a lot. Buy upgrades. Unlock 5 characters with special abilities. Most importantly: keep your fingers healthy.

name: Clear Vision Elite
summary: Clear Vision Elite is a free stick-sniper game. This time with a kitchen, a computer, an office, and much more. The physics, the puzzles, the stick men, the aiming. It all comes together with your choice of guns and ammo to create a truly immersive sniper experience. Is it revenge, are you trying to save the world? Are you doing it just for the money?

name: Classified: France '44: Overlord Edition
summary: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Classic NES Series: Metroid
summary: Classic NES Series: Metroid is a port of Metroid for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Cleany's Window Service
summary: You get a request from an unknown client. They need you to clean their windows during the night. Given the look of their luxurious home, you expect a big payout for your service.

name: Clock Tower for WonderSwan
summary:
Jennifer and her friends are adopted by a nice lady named Mary one day. They expect to be going to a wonderful new home, at the Barrows Mansion. There they will live with Mary and Mr. Barrows. Unfortunately, something goes terribly wrong and Jennifer's friends are showing up dead one by one. While this is happening, Mary is missing and Jennifer ends up being chased by a crazed psychopath known only as...Scissorman.

Now she must survive and get out of the mansion in this point-and-click horror adventure... Being a teenage girl, you have no special abilities at all, just your wits and your will to survive, there are a few enemies that can kill you instantly, but Scissorman is the true horror that will give you trouble.

name: Claw Crane Company
summary: Claw crane store management game. Make machines, arrange the prizes well, and aim for the world's best claw crane store. It's not only manage, you can also play, and must play yourself on the machines!!

name: ClockOut
summary: It's time to leave the office. No overtime work. Let's hurry home.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Deluxe Edition
summary: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Deluxe Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks.

name: Clash Warlords
summary: Join the Epic Battles in this most addicting turn-based strategy war-chess game with game play similar to classic Heroes of Might and Magic series.

name: Clifford the Big Red Dog: Reading
summary: Scholastic Clifford The Big Red Dog Reading is a game for the Leapster

name: Class of the Living Dead
summary:
High school couldn’t be more boring for you. Sure, you’ve got a cute friend who you’ve known since childhood, but your only true joy is playing video games. That all changes one day though when the whole town is overtaken by zombies!

You manage to find safety in a classroom along with a couple of other students including the beautiful student council president and the edgy outcast of your class. But the barricades will only last so long and the number of zombies is only increasing! Will you be able to escape to safety along with your three new allies?

name: Climb the Tower
summary: Challenging 3D platformer with a fantasy theme. Climb the tower and all defeat all its challenges.

name: Cluminati
summary: Test your linguistic skills in Cluminati, a puzzle word game where you decipher clues to unlock passwords and join a secret society. Use your wits while racing against time to advance through 13 challenging rounds of initiation.

name: Close Combat Trilogy
summary:
This compilation includes:

- Close Combat
- Close Combat: A Bridge Too Far
- Close Combat III: The Russian Front

name: Clockwork Knight: Pepperouchau no Fukubukuro
summary: Clockwork Knight: Pepperouchau no Fukubukuro is a compilation of Clockwork Knight 1 and 2. It came with a free set of Clockwork Knight round style Calendars for the year 1996.

name: Club Penguin: Elite Penguin Force
summary: Club Penguin: Elite Penguin Force is a DS game based on Disney's popular online world Club Penguin

name: Clash of Aggression
summary: Clash of Aggression is all about "last stand": your team against dozens of enemies. It features characters and weapons from the middle ages and from modern times.

name: Click On Bells Together
summary: Can you and your friends find all 100+ spanners in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Hard

name: Clever & Smart
summary:
Now, for the first time, you can join the mad world of Clever and Smart, already a successful cartoon strip in Germany, now a fantastic computer game. Their main task is to search for Doctor Bacterius who has been kidnapped by an evil organization called the O.M.A.

This is an incredibly tricky problem but possible to solve with the aid of these two bumbling detectives. A total blend of strategy and arcade-speed action and incredible graphics will make this the mission of a lifetime.

Get Clever- Get Smart and start praying (or should that be playing?)

name: Clawberta
summary:
Unlock surprise toys as you explore the neon fevered dream world of Clawberta, the U.F.O. catcher!
Get your claws on hundreds of cute gachapon toys from all over the globe. These toys are just waiting to break out and tell their story.

name: Cleanbot 9000
summary: 3D Platformer, MetroidVania style Collect-a-thon, this game will have you hop and bop, whack and vac with your outlet plug tail flail. Defeat bosses to clear boundaries. Unlock extra abilities and play as multiple characters!

name: Clutch-Master
summary: This is a 2D top-down shooter with a flair of parody. You need to clutch 16 rounds in a row to win the map. There are 10 different maps in the base game.

name: Cloud Crashers
summary: Fight for victory across airborne stages in Cloud Crashers, an arena platformer fighting game in the skies. Choose from a diverse roster of characters with unique weapons and abilities, and brawl it out against other Challengers in intense PvP action!

name: Closed Galaxy: Wata Tsumi yori Ai wo Komete
summary: "There's Something on This Spaceship" An SF horror mystery adventure game depicting a life-or-death struggle against an alien that imitates your crewmates.

name: Climb Up To The Sky
summary: Climb Up to the Sky is an adrenaline-fueled game that will put your reflexes and precision to the test.

name: Clown Works Kyojitsu Gairon 0 Shou Soshite 1 Shou
summary:
In the age of Ilias, this city was the warground of the god Idia.
It was a place of trauma, on the threshold of life and death.
Such history is unknown to most.

Now we go to the Meji era, to the strangely-named high school of Oedipus Heigakkou.

Boys and girls, like canaries, are attuned to their surroundings, sensing a discomfort.
One might call their abilities supernatural. Barometers for the health of the city.

Here, a murderous soul from seven years ago prepares for revenge.

Are you prepared to expose the trauma?

name: Click Miner
summary: The game takes place on an 8x8 grid, representing a layer of top-soil, and you play as The Click Miner. Your task is to hunt/click for the Magic Square, helped by mystical Arrows Of Mystery. Upon discovering (/clicking) the Magic Square, the soil is dug up around the area, revealing another layer of... who knows what? Only YOU can discover, as you go Deeper and Deeper into the Clicking World Of Click Miner.

name: Classical Jukebox
summary: Classical Jukebox is a a fully interactive visual program with music. History comes alive on your TV with the colorful lives of fifteen of the world's most gifted composers. Discover how Mozart began to compose at age five. Beethoven wrote his finest work after going deaf at age 47. Now CDI's interactive features give you full fidelity and digitally mastered stereo sound. Over 90 minutes of video highlighting facts about the composers, their work, and the periods in which they lived. The game also has the ability to create your own customized playlist.

name: Clashbowl
summary: Have fun & enjoy the best VR bowling atmosphere & graphics! Exactly like in real life right from your own comfort And without leaving your house!

name: Clueless: The CD-ROM
summary: Get a clue. Shop with blondie and chat it up until your vocals crap out.

name: Clash Mini
summary: A strategic board game set within the Clash universe where players position their favorite characters and watch them come to life for battle!

name: Cloud Rack
summary: A chivalrous man came to the mountain full of secret rumors to explore the truth, overcome all kinds of difficulties, meet all kinds of characters, and uncover the unknown secrets.

name: Clockwork Rabbit
summary: Tessa the bunny was hired at a textile factory as a mechanic. Create and program robots to solve logical puzzles.

name: Clotilde Soffritti in: Never Buy a Used Spaceship
summary:
Thinking about buying a used spaceship? Think again!
In this cautionary tale of great emotional impact (?), our heroine Clotilde finds herself stuck on an old spaceship, directed towards the sun!
Only you can save the ship! Oh, and her life too.

One player character!
Lots of stuff to click on!
Comic book style cutscenes!
720p graphics! Lots of pixels for the whole family!
No less than 13 inventory items!
15 rooms, not even a third of them playable!
No moral choices whatsoever!
So many puzzles!
Several gripping minutes of gameplay!

name: Club Soccer Director 2019
summary:
Be more than just a Football Manager! 
 
Club Soccer Director is a football/soccer management game where you take on a role of Director of Football at an established football club or create your very own club! 
 
​Your main job is to be the go between the football manager and the board of directors. You are responsible for hiring the manager and the backroom staff like coaches, assistant managers, physios, scouts, academy managers and the full day to day management of the club.

name: Clotilde Soffritti in Never Double Park your Spaceship
summary:
After being stuck on an asteroid with a decrepit, gabby hermit for a week, Clotilde has had enough!

She must find a way to call for help and hitch-hike a ride out of there!

Will she manage to escape the asteroid?! Only one way to find out! Or maybe two.

name: Cluefinders: Math Adventures - Mystery of the Himalayas
summary: An Edutainment game.

name: Class of Heroes
summary: Class of Heroes is a role-playing dungeon crawler game. As a student of Particus Academy, you will learn the ups and downs of dungeon spelunking, with each quest solved and monster slain a step towards graduation.

name: Closed World
summary: HD-2D Dungeon Exploration JRPG. Strengthen your weapons and armor with obtained materials and acquire hidden skills across the land to delve deeper into the world. Conquer complex labyrinths, break the seals of the world, and aim for the land of ancient legends!

name: Clockwerk
summary: An unreleased game by Next Level Games which would have been about a pair of elderly Hausmeisters who take care of "the World Clock" named Otto and Herman, of whom just as they're about to retire have to stop some enemies from dismantling the said clock.

name: Cloaked Protocol
summary: Dive into Cloaked Protocol: an electrifying retro stealth-action game. Outwit elite mercenaries with strategic stealth in a world of espionage, where every move weaves a gripping narrative.

name: Classic Arcade Fishing
summary: A masterpiece of classic arcade fishing shooting game with many expanded ways to play! Picture upgrade, explosion rate upgrade, welfare upgrade, everything upgrade! Super high gun magnification, super many bosses, super high magnification, super explosive, and make you rich in one shot!

name: ClickDragType
summary: Click, Drag, and Type your way through 5 puzzles.

name: Clock Out
summary:
Medium-sized speedmap in a vanilla-flavoured underground industrial setting.
This was originally intended for Doomworld community project "Isolation" but Derek "Afterglow" MacDonald ended up spending more than the allocated 12 hour dev time.
These mapping restrictions are followed:
- Must not use of F_SKY1. - Must use damaging NUKAGE1. - Must place health items on FWATER1. - Use of Cacodemons encouraged.

name: Clubhouse Games
summary: It's game night and everyone's invited. Play more than 20 classic board, card and party games alone, with friends or via Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection. With familiar favorites like checkers, darts and poker, Clubhouse Games is for everyone and part of the Touch Generations library. Video game newcomers will appreciate the easy-to-use interface. Players can challenge up to seven friends with one game card via Multi-Card Play or DS Download Play. Can't play checkers without shouting "KING ME!" across the table? The in-game (PictoChat-like) feature takes table talk to a new level. There's no need to lug around cards or boards when you want to play a quick game. Clubhouse Games is one-stop gaming that will appeal to everyone's tastes, whether they're in the mood for bowling, backgammon, bridge or billiards.

name: Clumsy Cannon
summary: Clumsy Cannon is a game where you play as a box with a cannon, trying to reach the top of different zones. Master the art of cannon propulsion and overcome various obstacles in this unique and challenging game.

name: Cluaido
summary: A procedural mystery game where you play as the detective to solve a murder case. Find hidden clues, solve logical puzzles and freely interrogate the suspects in a game populated with AI characters who'll answer dynamically to your questions.

name: Click to Twelve
summary: In this game all you do is click until the center number becomes twelve, play this incredibly engaging experience for about 20 seconds then immediately forget about it’s existence

name: Clock Overwhelmed
summary: Organize tasks within your routine, but be careful not to overlap activities and get overwhelmed!

name: ClickCells: Office Lady
summary: In the game you have to solve puzzles with multi-colored cubes. Your task is to destroy all the orange cubes, and deliver the blue to the platform, and in between the levels enjoy the images of a beautiful naked girl.

name: Classified: France '44 - Deluxe Edition
summary: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Clif Danger
summary:
In Clif Danger players control the titular protagonist who flies through the galaxy with his spaceship when he receives a call for help by the amazon queen Swihip. Her planet Pleasure 6 got invaded from the rather hostile Glox so it is up to him to save her population. 
 
The game focuses on the typical run, gun, jump mechanics and as such the plot is not that important. The game offers twenty stages with multiple weapons, where Clif encounters a dozen different enemies and free the amazons from their rather inconvenient position of being bound on plugs.

name: Clutchball
summary: Dodgeball deathmatch in a huge arena — anything's allowed. Throw balls at waves of opponents, unlock teammates to help you get further, and reach the final boss!

name: Classified: France '44 - Devils
summary:
Fight like devils on the streets of Paris with the new Devils pack, with a new map, special ops missions, weapons and new equipment for British Paras.

New Map – “Paris Streets”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Man the Barricades
• Thieves Never Rest
Two New Weapon Variants
• Walther P38 “Special”
• FG42 “Flank”
New Clothing Set
• British Para “Devils” set

name: Classified: France '44 - Season Pass Upgrade Pack
summary:
The Season Pass Upgrade Pack contains:

DLC 2 - Agent Pack
DLC 3 - Talon Pack
DLC 4 - Devils Pack

Continue the war behind enemy lines with the Agent pack, outfitting your resistance fighters with new gear for your covert operations

name: Clever Girls
summary: Clever Girls is a story-driven, relationship-focused, turn-based DinosauRPG! Outwit poachers with stealth and teamwork while also navigating relationship drama. Explore a mysterious decaying island, defeat overwhelming odds and escape capture.

name: Climate Survivors
summary: The climate crisis is hitting humanity with increasing force - but you're hitting back. Dodge, fight, and level up in arenas around the world. Customize your champion and utilize the full arsenal humanity has at its disposal to show an endless swam of natural hazards who's boss.

name: Classic Racing Pack: Moto Roader MC + Rider's Spirits
summary: ~ Moto Roader MC + Rider's Spirits ~

name: Close Your Eyes
summary: Through a stroke of sheer luck, you've managed to escape death row. Taking to an underground subway, you must try to find your salvation. Can you break free of the past that binds you? And please, can you close your eyes? Just close them.

name: Click Me: Hentai Adventure
summary: Welcome to our exciting clicker game where you interact with charming characters! Choose from a variety of attractive girls, uncover their outfits, and experience different levels of nudity. Satisfy characters to add intrigue and diversity to gameplay.

name: Clean Half-Life
summary: Actions take place during half-life 1. We play as a scientist in HEV and try to get out of the black mesa. Passing through the trials of a terrible catastrophe, you gradually solve a terrible riddle. Can you get to the key that will open the scary curtain of secrecy?

name: Classic DOOM 3
summary: The Classic Doom 3 modification is a remake of the original Doom game, by id Software. The main emphesis is that of brining the older game up to date in a modern graphics engine. The project makes use of all of Doom 3's advanced graphical features while retaining the feel and gameplay of the original game.

name: Clumsy Ninja
summary:
Meet Clumsy Ninja, the most hapless ninja ever to grace a touchscreen!

Train him, throw him, tickle him, and even tie balloons to him. Everything you do will make Clumsy Ninja more skillful, and help him find his missing friend, Kira.

Clumsy Ninja is the next generation of interactive characters! He can sense, feel, move, and react uniquely every time. Prepare to be amazed…oh, and please take good care of him!

name: Clency and Livia
summary: Clency and Livia is a strategy game. You will control a pair of brother and sister who strayed from their father because of a war. They are starving and chased by soldiers. Could you help they through the difficulties?

name: Close to: Inori no Oka
summary: Close to: Inori no Oka is an Adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Club Nintendo Picross
summary: Club Nintendo Picross is a game in Nintendo's Picross series that was only available to Japanese members of Club Nintendo. It was downloadable for 80 points. Like all Picross games, the player must solve nonograms, where a picture is made by filling in squares on a grid within a time limit. Which squares are filled is determined by numbers on each row and column. The numbers indicate how many squares are filled in within that row or column. A wrong guess penalizes time. Too many wrong guesses, and the game is over.

name: Clubhouse Games Express: Card Classics
summary: DSi ware card game.

name: Clean City Project
summary: A rabbit-shaped cleaning robot flies around collecting, shooting, and destroying to restore the beauty of the city. A sandbox shooter game!

name: Click On Ladybugs Together
summary: Can you and your friends find all 100+ ladybugs in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Medium (but has small objects)

name: Clone Evolution
summary:
The future of science fiction themed card games is here! Download this amazing IDLE RPG battle game to begin commanding the evolution of your next generation army of clones today!
It’s the year 2045 and on the borderlands of South America’s Atacama Desert, a team of expert scientists under the command of the evil F-Tec are presenting their findings of a series of never seen before biological experiments to senior F-Tec officials.

name: Climbing Mountain Sins
summary: Embark on a challenging journey of redemption in Climbing Mountain Sins. Conquer sins, and climb to heavenly salvation. Master climbing, face obstacles, uncover secrets. A keyboard-breaking, nail-biting adventure. Can you ascend and overcome your inner demons? Rise to absolution!

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Director's Cut
summary: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Director's Cut is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Cleaning The World With Pampam
summary: Help Pampam eliminate the incorrectly disposed garbage to save nature in this cute and super different educative infinite runner game! Evade obstacles, fight bosses and use a variety of powers-ups to clean the world!

name: Clawbert: ToyTown
summary:
Manage a city filled with the cutest and most amazing toys!
Your favorite claw machine character of 2017, Clawbert, is back in action! You are the manager of ToyTown, a fantastical world where you build amazingly cute toys!!!
Claw-some!!!

name: Cloudy Super Mario Bros. U 2
summary: Sequel to the New Super Mario Bros. U mod Cloudy SMBU. This mod features 40+ levels, many new tilesets and an original soundtrack composed of brand new tracks and remixes.

name: Clean Sweep
summary: A 3D, comedic, character-driven, action-RPG where everyone in Cleanland is a personification of a cleaning product! As the town janitor you'll befriend the residents of Cleanland and team up with them to fight germs!

name: Clocker
summary:
Clocker is a puzzle game about father-daughter relationship. Love can touch us once and last for a lifetime, especially in a tale where we can control the time.

The world has been swallowed into the grey void of time and space. The only key to the winding puzzle - a time-controling pocket-watch - lies in the hands of a clockmaker Father. Powerful and otherwordly, the watch creates a mysterious barrier between the Father and his estranged Daughter. Will they ultimately find each other, or both dissolve into the grey?

name: Clubhouse Games Express: Family Favorites
summary: This is a downloadable game recently released on the Nintendo DSiWare shop.

name: Clever Kids Pony World
summary:
Pony World brings the magic of the stable yard to life. Meet the animals, learn the facts and become a stable master.

Clever Kids is a brand new multi-format product range from Midas featuring hugely enjoyable and yet educationally beneficial gaming products.

name: Click on Clocks Together
summary: Can you and your friends find all 100+ clocks in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Medium

name: Classic Mario World 2: The Great Alliance
summary:
Classic Mario World 2: The Great Alliance is a direct sequel for Classic Mario world 1:The Magical Crystals.

After the last adventure Bowser decided to get revenge over the mushroom kingdom by forming an evil alliance with various villains from the mushrooms kingdom lands, its up to Mario to stop him.

This hack has 120 exits.

name: Clea: Complete Collection
summary:
Clea is a jump scare free, skill-based survival horror adventure.

Mum and Dad have been experimenting on Chaos Servants, but now, the monsters have been let loose. Clea, with her brother in tow, must escape from the Whitlock Mansion.

name: Clash'N Slash: Worlds Away
summary: In Worlds Away, as in our original Clash'N Slash, you must defend your planet from pesky alien invaders arriving from all over the galaxy. This time, alien hordes are more diverse and clever featuring more than 70 enemy types and 12 huge bosses. But worry not, as there are two brave heroes on your side! Barry Barnes (codename: Clash) and Liz Valentine (codename: Slash) are there to help you save humanity.

name: Classic NES Series: Excitebike
summary: Nintendo rereleases Excitebike on the Game Boy Advance, complete with all the high-flying action from the original NES game. As in the original, your biker must keep his balance while flying through the air, avoid getting clipped by other racers, and prevent his bike from overheating. In Design mode, you can make your own course--with all the ramps, mounds, bridges, and other obstacles in the game--and then save the design for your friends to race on.

name: Clicker Heroes: Whelpling Auto Clicker
summary: Take some load off your fingers with this brand new special edition Whelping Dragon Auto Clicker.

name: Closing Shift
summary: As you were closing for the night, you see a creature in the distance approaching. Fight for you life using the limited resources inside your grocery store.

name: Clash of Steel: World War II, Europe 1939-45
Classic Trainer
summary: Classic Trainer is a business simulator that allows you to own five horses and race them over various seasons with the aim to win The Derby at the end of each season. Each season lasts 20 weeks, with the choice of three races in a meeting every week if you choose to race a horse. You start the game with £5000 and before a meeting you have various options for your horses and yourself, which cost you money. Give your horses a workout, treat their injuries, get a loan and retain a jockey. Once you are happy with your selections, you are then shown your horses and their fitness, class and race stats. You also have the option to sell a horse.

name: Clear Vision 4
summary: Help Tyler get his hitman career back on track by making your way through tons of tailor-made sniper missions and build your arsenal of shooting guns.

name: Close Encounters
summary: Deflect one or more balls to targets for collection. Each planet presents a challenging array of targets that must be collected to the waiting UFO above.

name: Classic Solitaire
summary: Play the classic card game of Solitaire! Experience the fun and strategy of sequencing the cards from a randomly ordered deck. Play casually at your leisure or beat your best time by going through the stock pile the fewest possible times.

name: Classified: France '44 - Talon
summary:
Hit the enemy where it hurts with new missions and a brand new map in the Talon Pack, with new equipment for the US Airbourne.

The Talon Pack contains:
New Map – “Manor”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Foul Manors
• Hostage Negotiation
New Weapon:
• Mosin-Nagant M1891
New Weapon Variant:
• Trench Gun “Bear”
New Clothing Set
• US Airbourne “Talon” Set

name: Clone Hero
summary: Clone Hero is a free rhythm game, which can be played with any 5 or 6 button Guitars, Drums (knockoffs, MiDis and from official guitar hero or rock band series), Gamepad Controllers, or just your standard computer keyboard. Download the game, copy your song charts into the song folder and enjoy hours of fun!

name: Clash of Robots
summary: CLASH OF ROBOTS is a real time multiplayer futuristic fighting game where mean metal machines with diverse personalities face off each other in a fight for domination. Are you ready for the ultimate fighting challenge? Play on to find out how far you can go to be the best fighter in this real-time multiplayer filled with 3D futuristic fighting machines!

name: Clutter's Greatest Hits: Collector's Edition
summary: The most addicting Un-Hidden Object game you'll ever play, Clutter 13 is the most fun & challenging Clutter yet. Over 2000 puzzles will keep you playing for days and days. Featuring 25% more puzzles and additional bonus materials.

name: CleanFall
summary: CleanFall is a survival rogue-lite that prizes player freedom and creativity. Build mobile death machines to fight off ravenous hordes, craft and alchemize gun turrets, and tunnel through subterranean ecosystems crawling with nameless horrors.

name: Clutter 12: It's About Time - Collector's Edition
summary: By far, the most challenging and exciting Clutter ever. Every picture tells part of the story, and the story is of course, About Time!!! Clocks, Spirals & Singletons are worth the price of admission. The very first Clutter Collector's Edition, so you know it's special. Good luck with the Portals!!!

name: Clear the Train
summary: While cleaning the train, you can use a gun or a shotgun, if you don't want to use bullets, you can use your katana. Kill the zombies that damage you by exploding both from a close and a distance and try to pass the wagon as much as possible.

name: Cloud Bashers DX
summary: So, you wanna bash some clouds huh? Go through 10 worlds each with different cloud types and a boss that's out to take you down. Bash them all with your trusty bat and take back the skies!

name: Clawbert
summary:
Clawbert is a lonely claw. He only has two fingers. But he has a full heart! Help Clawbert find friends. Make Clawbert happy again!
Collect the cutest, most adorable toy creatures from surprise eggs as you try to fill your collection.

name: ClockWork
summary: ClockWork is a casual, puzzle-arcade game, which tells the story of siblings who run a watchmaking workshop. The action of the game takes place in a humorous, colorful world, in which one of the main characters... is a talking toucan.

name: Classic Sudoku
summary: Classic Sudoku is a sudoku puzzle game. The sudokus in the game cover a wide range of difficulty with something for everyone - and also require an incredible range of techniques to solve them efficiently! Players start with zero stars and earn stars by solving puzzles. The more puzzles you solve, the more stars you earn and the more puzzles you get to play.

name: Closed Island
summary: Welcome to the classic RPG. You will plunge into the magical Middle Ages in order to clear the cursed island of various wickedness step by step.

name: Cloud 9
summary:
Shoot clouds in the sky. Avoid rain drops and other enemies. Try to destroy all clouds before your chamber is flooded.

Cloud 9 was produced by Atari in 1983.

Atari released 137 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1972. Atari was based in United States.

Other machines made by Atari during the time period Cloud 9 was produced include: Fast Freddie, Gravitar, Dig Dug, Black Widow, Akka Arrh, Alpha 1, Arabian, Cloak & Dagger, Crystal Castles, and Firebeast aka Dragon Master

name: Cluck and Conquer
summary: Command an army of battle-ready chickens in this roguelite, micro-focused RTS. Hatch new units, expand your numbers and upgrade your flock into an unstoppable clucking force of destruction!

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Extended Edition
Clay Monkey: The Master Potter and The Kiln God
summary: Clay Monkey is a top-down exploration game based on sourcing materials from the earth to make ceramic art that will be displayed in a final art exhibition. With a dream, not just a monkey; an artist.

name: Clover Tale
summary: A mysterious black mist has fallen on the Nifflings' Valley. Everyone is agitated, but no one understands what's happening. Help the Nifflings save their home in this exciting Match-3 game!

name: Click to Survive
summary: More clicks - more supplies, more supplies - more days

name: Classic Pool
summary: Classic Pool Classic Pool is a wonderful, exciting pool game that allows you to test your skills and improve them in a traditional game of pool. You have multiple AI opponents to choose from, many different cues and tables, as well as complete multiplayer for 2 players. The game also comes with handheld, TV and tabletop mod. If you love pool games and want to test your prowess against friends or AI, then check it out today!

name: ClayFighter: Sculptor's Cut
summary: Get ready to crumble... with this special edition of the world's funniest fighting game! This "director's cut" contains many extras added to the original Clay Fighter 63 1/3 game. You might lose lives, you might lose limbs, but don't lose your sense of humor! 12 eccentric fighters plus 4 additional clay combatants only found in this version. More snide remarks and barbed wit will have you crying from laughing so hard! Original characters get additional attacks for an all-new experience. Enhanced camera angle stays put to see more details in the environment and improve fight control!

name: Classic Card Game Solitaire Mahjong
summary: Take on the tiles of mahjong and meet your match. You'll love every minute that you spend perfecting your Solitaire Mahjong game.

name: Cleaning Queens
summary: House cleaning has never been more fun - just relax and clean now!

name: Classic Checkers
summary: Classic Checkers is an engaging checkers game that helps you enjoy a realistic, fun gameplay of this extraordinary board game. The visuals are extraordinary, and you can also see the current score right away. It's also possible to rotate the board if you want for the best results and experience. You can play Classic Checkers against an AI that has multiple difficulties. It's also possible to play PVP against your friends if you want.

name: Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics
summary: Play and discover 51 board games, tabletop games, and more all in one package—Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics. This diverse collection includes games from all over the world across multiple genres, from familiar favorites like Chess to international hits like Mancala that have been around for hundreds of years!

name: ClickeRogue
summary: Slay enemies using clicks, spells and get stronger by leveling up in endless dungeons !

name: Classic Sonic 3D Adventure
summary:
Sonic and Tails take on a new adventure and experience from the norm. In objective to stop Eggman to take control over all the flickies is this unusual world.
Dr. Robotnik latest evil device suck Sonic and Tails to some other dimension taking everything they know with them. As the best option, they have to stop Dr. Robotnik and save all the flickies to bring them back to their original world!

name: Close Combat: Cross of Iron
summary: Close Combat: Cross of Iron is an enhanced remake of the critically acclaimed real time strategy game, Close Combat III: The Russian Front by Atomic Games. Playing as either the Germans or Russians, the game takes place during WWII on the Russian Front, where as a commander you must lead your troops through five years of brutal combat.

name: Clawfish
summary: Clawfish is a fishing claw machine game. Visit an isolated train station with a fishing arcade. Explore the dock, play the machines, and take some time to relax by the water.

name: Close Combat: The Longest Day
summary:
Close Combat is a pausable real-time wargame series, heavily focused on historical accuracy and realistic soldier psychological profiles. Team management is crucial as every man in your teams matter. in Close Combat: the Longest Day take command of either the Allied Expeditionary Force or Germany’s Wehrmacht.

Remake of Close Combat: Invasion of Normandy.
